name: northwest
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 the direction that is between north and west: We live in the northwest of the city. the Northwest
the area in the northwest of England, the US, or another country: The Lake District is a very beautiful region in the Northwest. Seattle is the largest city in the Northwest.
More examplesFewer examplesUnemployment in the northwest has been falling.They moved to the northwest last year.Manchester is in the northwest of England.The motorway connects the northwest with the midlands.He grew up in the northwest of Scotland.

B1 in or towards the northwest: the sale of the company's northwest division Turn northwest. The town is/lies about 100 miles northwest of Las Vegas. northwest wind
a wind that comes from the northwest: Strong northwest winds had blown the volcanic ash out to sea and over Europe.
